definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: They compiled thousands of case history to prove the relationship between smoking and cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他们收集了数以千计的病历来证明吸烟与癌症的关系。

sentences.english: We sell ice - creams by the thousand in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我们在夏天出售的冰淇淋数以千计。

sentences.english: Thousands of English words are derived from Latin.
sentences.chinese: 数以千计的英语词汇源自拉丁语。

sentences.english: They sold in the thousands, and in the tens of thousands.
sentences.chinese: 它们的销售成绩数以千计，数以万计。

sentences.english: The new building of the museum has thousands of historic exhibits.
sentences.chinese: 这个博物馆的新建筑内有数以千计的历史展品。

sentences.english: Hundreds of moths flew against the lighthouse windows.
sentences.chinese: 数以千计的飞蛾扑向灯塔的窗子。

sentences.english: There are thousands of hot springs and fountains.
sentences.chinese: 园内有数以千计的温泉和喷泉。

sentences.english: Several years ago, thousands of Canada gees geese landed on his feelsfields.
sentences.chinese: 几年前，数以千计的加拿大鹅迁徙到他的田地。

sentences.english: Thousands of people come to Beijing for a visit during May Day.
sentences.chinese: 五一国际劳动节期间，数以千计的人来北京参观。

sentences.english: This advance has the potential to save thousands of lives each year.
sentences.chinese: 这项进展有潜力每年挽救数以千计的生命。

sentences.english: Thousands of Buddhist pagodas and Confucian temples spotted the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 数以千计的佛塔和孔庙散布在风景区。

sentences.english: Over the years thousands have come and gone.
sentences.chinese: 多年来已有数以千计的指标来去匆匆。

sentences.english: Thousands of waterfowl breed round the lake and live off the fish.
sentences.chinese: 数以千计的水鸟在湖边繁殖，靠鱼为食来生活。

sentences.english: It sells thousands of push-pins all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 公司在全世界销售数以千计的图钉。

sentences.english: The liberal candidate romped through with thousands of votes to spare.
sentences.chinese: 自由党候选人轻易获胜，超出选票数以千计。

sentences.english: "Durex is expecting thousands of applicants, " the statement said.
sentences.chinese: 这项声明称杜蕾斯期待着数以千计的申请者。

definition: hundreds/a large number/lit. by the hundreds and thousands
lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
lit. their number cannot be counted (idiom); fig. countless/innumerable
over ten thousand/fig. untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
numerous and close together/densely packed/thickly dotted/thick/dense
